name: start new career
story:
Your probabtion period starts for 30 days shortly.
 How you want to proceed?
nav:
Press 1 - Go Onboarding
Press 2-  Learn by doing

name: onboarding
story:
Your probabtion period starts now. Your goal is to survive probabtion period of 30 days.
You will be assigned a task everyday, to survive you need to complete the task within the deadlines. 
Are you ready to proceed?
nav: Press 1 - GO

name: learn by doing
story:
Good Morning, As the Germans say: Early bird catches worm. 
Will you come to work earlier than usual on time or later?
nav:
Press 1 On-Time
Press 2 - Early
Press 3 - Late

name: Early
story:
You slip out of the bed and try not to wake up your spouse. 
And think what to do next should you take taxi to reach faster or 
save money by going on bus or drop the idea of going early and go on-time
nav:
Press 1 - Take Taxi
Press 2 - Take Bus 
Press 3 - Go On-Time

name: On-Time
story: You arrive  at work on time, your supervisor looks at you reproachfully.
nav:
Press 1-Work
Press 2 - Life
Press 3 - Explore

name: Loose
story: You silly, who misses  the first day of the work you are fired!!!

name: Take Bus
story: You are at the bus stop and waiting for the bus.  Make your choice now.
nav:
Press 1 -Take bus and reach on Time
Press 2 - Miss the Bus
Press 3 - Bus  Met an Accident

name: Work
story:
You Reached.You pitched an idea and it gets rejected because of the wrong choice and
 you are upset at the first day of the work. What you will do next?
nav:
Press 1 - Quit Job
Press 2 - Take a coffee break
Press 3 - Search for a better idea

name: Take Taxi
story: You are on the way to work in taxi. What you want to happen next? Make a wise choice
nav:
Press 1 - Reach on-time 
Press 2 - Driver Take wrong turn

name: Overtime
story:
You stay in the office and continue working on that thing. 
You wake up at your desk from the sound of the smart photocopier booting.What happens next?
nav: Press 1 - Go Home

name: Explore
story: You are looking around the large office building to explore. Where you want to go next?
nav:
Press 1 -Go back to your workstation
Press 2 to Start working on Presentation
Press 3 to Chat with a Friend

name: Life
story: Your workmate's screen is unlocked. You read his personal message.What will happen next?
nav:
Press 1 to Go Back to Your workstation
 Press 2 You got Caught
Press 3 You have to do Overtime

name: Loose
story: Terrible You Chicken out!!! It was not expected...

name: Coffee break
story: You are having lunch with your family. Your superior, who is in a bad mood, turns your afternoon into hell.What next?
nav:
Press 1 - Go back to your Workstation 
Press 2 - Search for better idea

name: Miss the  Bus
story: You miss the bus!!! What you will do next??
nav:
Press 1 - Take Taxi
Press 2 - Go Back home

name: Bus Accident
story: Your bus met with an accident now what you will do?
nav:
Press 1 -Reach On time
Press 2 - Go Back Home
Press 3 -Get a help from stranger

name: Loose
story:
You are Fired because. You didn't reach on time for the job. 
But you are safe and your family is happy to see you fine!!Better luck next time

name: Search for a better idea
story: You came back to work station and suddenly a notification  pops on social media what you will do now??
nav:
Press 1 - Have a look at your social media
Press 2 - No, You will research for better idea

name: Social media
story: You are scrolling through your social media. What happens next?
nav:
Press 1 - You Got Caught
Press 2 - You started chatting with your friend

name: Research
story: You are researching for new ideas and exhausted what you do next?
nav:
Press 1 - Chat with friend
Press 2 - GO Home

name: Caught
story: You are caught for your misdeed. Now what you will do next ?
nav:
Press 1 - Go back to your worksstation
Press 2 -Take a Break

name: Chat with Friend
story: You got your friend online on your social media and started chatting. What happens next?
nav:
Press 1- You got caught chatting
Press 2 - Go back and research
Press 3 - You got Idea from your friend

name: Friend gave you Idea
story: You got an Idea from your friend what you do next??
nav: Press 1 - Present the Idea

name: Driver took a wrong turn
story: Your Taxi driver lost his way and now you are stuck don't know what to do?
nav:
Press 1 - Take stranger's help
Press 2 - Take a Bus

name: Go Back to your Workstation
story: You are embarrassed and start working on your idea. Its time to move to next step
nav:
Press 1 - Research
Press 2 - Explore Office
Press 3 - Chat with Friend

name: Win
story:
Your day was bit stressful, but when you reach home you saw happy faces of your spouse and children.
 And take them to theme park and You won the game by having a successful day at work.

name: Stranger
story: You meet a stranger and ask for the help. He stops by and you started talking to him what happens next?
nav: Press 1 - Go to work

name: Win
story: You present,your Idea Works and get selected. Your first day at work was successful. You win the game
